s.text: Windows must eat the browser market or be eaten.
By sundering IE from Windows, Gates suggests, the government would fracture the platform and pull down the whole house of cards.
Windows must eat the browser market or be eaten.
By sundering IE from Windows, Gates suggests, the government would fracture the platform and pull down the whole house of cards.
DOJ accuses Microsoft of violating a consent decree by leveraging Windows' 90-percent share of the computer-operating-system market to corner the browser market with its Internet Explorer.
